value: With a bit more knowledge about svelte under my belt, I decided to follow through with an upgrade of sorts for this webiste. Complete with this here blog.
There was a bit of agony going forward with publishing this new build. Could I really say I added and polished everything I wanted to a tee.
But that's the crux of many a project, going in with what you have and in cases like these, have your work face the world.
Butterflies aside, this is still a labor of love and the culmination of what has defined me thus far. I can honeslty say that I have always had creative ambitions.
I still hold onto them too. As painful as it may be, the first steps in the journey puts into perspective just how vast your pursuits may be.
And yet, the first steps must be taken to get anything done at all. I am committed to putting myself out there and sharpen my image while doing so.
